definition.name: Jira Issue Transition
definition.description: Change status of specific Jira issue

inputs.name: issue
inputs.description: Key of the issue to be transitioned

inputs.name: transition
inputs.description: The transition to apply to the issue, e.g. 'In Progress'

inputs.name: transitionId
inputs.description: The id of a transition to apply to the issue

evidence.reasoning: This action is primarily focused on changing the status of Jira issues, which is a form of communication within project management and team collaboration. It also serves as a notification mechanism for team members about the status changes.
